title: Supreme Court hands tech companies a win, and not just about Section 230
description: A pair of Supreme Court rulings served notice that social media sites like Twitter and YouTube won't always be held responsible for promoting harmful content.

title: Don’t get hacked on Facebook. Do these 6 things now.
description: If you think you're safe from hackers and scammers on Facebook, you're wrong. Here's how to protect yourself.

title: How TikTok went from teen sensation to political pariah
description: In the seven years since TikTok was born as lip-syncing app for Chinese teens, the platform has reshaped the media landscape — forcing U.S. tech giants to reckon with a foreign rival.

title: Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes is going to prison. Here’s what to know.
description: A judge ordered Holmes, founder of the failed blood-testing startup Theranos, to begin serving her 11-year sentence for fraud and conspiracy on May 30.

title: ‘Astonishing’ 3D scans reveal Titanic shipwreck in extraordinary new detail
description: The images by British mapping company Magellan reveal the Titanic in unprecedented clarity. The ship sank in 1912 and still grips the public imagination.

title: As AI changes jobs, Italy is trying to help workers retrain
description: Italy will spend some $30 million to help workers whose jobs are at risk as artificial intelligence transforms the labor market worldwide.

title: A prof falsely accused his class of using ChatGPT. Their diplomas are in jeopardy.
description: A Texas A&M instructor falsely accused students of using ChatGPT to write essays, putting them at risk of failing.
